about.title: About TDevSpace
about.intro: TDevSpace is a modern, creative learning environment where aspiring developers and curious young minds come together to explore the ever-evolving world of technology.
about.philosophy: We believe that education should be practical, inspiring, and personal — not just theoretical. That’s why we built TDevSpace not as another course platform, but as a mentorship-driven community that helps learners unlock their full potential through hands-on experience and real guidance.

whatWeOffer.title: What We Offer
whatWeOffer.mentorship: Real Mentorship: Students are guided by experienced developers who provide real feedback, code reviews, and support.
whatWeOffer.projects: Project-Based Learning: Every course includes real-world projects so learners graduate with a portfolio they can showcase.
whatWeOffer.forAll: For All Ages & Levels: Whether you’re just starting out or preparing for a tech career, we tailor our approach to your level.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.learnBuildEvolve: We help learners learn modern tools and technologies, build real applications and websites, and evolve into confident developers ready to take on the future.
mission.belief: At TDevSpace, we believe that everyone can create something meaningful with code — and we’re here to help you get there, one step at a time.

contact.title: Get in Touch with TDevSpace
contact.success: Thank you! We’ll get back to you soon.

js.title: JavaScript Fundamentals
js.description: Master JS basics — variables, loops, DOM, and logic building.

react.title: React & Redux Mastery
react.description: Build real-world SPAs with React, Context API, and Redux Toolkit.

js.title: JavaScript Fundamentals
js.description: Master JS basics — variables, loops, DOM, and logic building.
js.summary: This 9-month course is perfect for beginners who want to start their programming journey with confidence. It focuses on clarity, practice, and strong foundations.
js.point1: JavaScript syntax, variables, and data types

react.title: React & Redux Mastery
react.description: Build real-world SPAs with React, Context API, and Redux Toolkit.
react.summary: This 4-month course is tailored for students who already know JavaScript and want to build production-grade apps using React and Redux. You'll master advanced frontend concepts and build a complete SPA.
react.point1: React fundamentals: JSX, components, and hooks
react.point2: Advanced state management with Redux Toolkit
react.point3: Using Context API and React Router
react.point4: Building and deploying full Single Page Applications

kids.title: Web Dev for Kids
kids.description: Intro to HTML, CSS, JavaScript for children with fun projects.
kids.summary: This 4-month playful course introduces kids (ages 10–16) to the world of web development. Students will learn how to build websites from scratch in a visual and interactive way.
kids.point2: Styling with CSS for fun layouts
kids.point4: Mini-projects like personal websites and simple games

math.title: Math Enrichment
math.description: Boost logic, critical thinking, and math skills through engaging activities.
math.summary: This course is designed for students who want to improve their core math skills, build strong logic, and gain confidence in problem solving. Ideal for support in school and preparation for STEM paths.
